text:
......Alright, done with shopping for today.
────Let's go home quickly.

Wow......!
This bouquet is so beautiful......!

Since it’s a wedding celebration, I made sure
the wrapping feels wedding-like as well.

Thank you so much......!
Hehe, I can't wait to give it.

（Someday......
I want to give something like this to Mikoto-san────）

（No no! We're not even friends yet────
I don't know about something that far ahead......）
"The practice room is available now. Do you have time?"

（"Yes! I'm out right now,
but I'll go home to drop off my stuff and head straight there!"）
